page.title: 12LODE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Lode School is going to be closed down at the end of July,1985.There are 32 children and two full-time teachers in the school as well as a part-time teacher,a secretary and dinne ladies. The Head Teacher is called Mrs.McAuley and the Infants teacher is called Mrs. Flude. The school has a very big playing area outside with a climbing frame and a learner swimming pool.The building is mainly one big room and has a thatched roof. Most people in Lode are not happy about the school closing and have protested.The children have been told to go to Bottisham after the summer holiday but some are going to Swaffham Bulbeck.
